# sg-progress



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property        | Attribute       | Description                    | Type                                             | Default     |
| --------------- | --------------- | ------------------------------ | ------------------------------------------------ | ----------- |
| `animated`      | `animated`      | Animated stripes               | `boolean`                                        | `false`     |
| `color`         | `color`         | Color variant                  | `"error" \| "primary" \| "success" \| "warning"` | `'primary'` |
| `indeterminate` | `indeterminate` | Indeterminate state (animated) | `boolean`                                        | `false`     |
| `label`         | `label`         | Custom label                   | `string`                                         | `undefined` |
| `max`           | `max`           | Maximum value                  | `number`                                         | `100`       |
| `showLabel`     | `show-label`    | Show percentage label          | `boolean`                                        | `false`     |
| `size`          | `size`          | Size variant                   | `"lg" \| "md" \| "sm"`                           | `'md'`      |
| `striped`       | `striped`       | Striped pattern (linear only)  | `boolean`                                        | `false`     |
| `type`          | `type`          | Progress type                  | `"circular" \| "linear"`                         | `'linear'`  |
| `value`         | `value`         | Current progress value (0-100) | `number`                                         | `0`         |
